name: Instance Select
description:
@FORMINSTANCE, @EVENTINSTANCE and $RECORDINSTANCE action tags for unvalidated text fields that enable you to select a specific instance of a repeating form or event for the current record, or another record from the project.

When the data entry or survey page loads, a tagged text field will be replaced with a select list with options for each instance of the specified form / event for the current record, or project records.
